rows.label: campfev11_1400_msg0001
rows.name:
I wonder what was
in that report Hugo got.

rows.label: campfev11_1400_msg0002
rows.name:
Rather than letting our
imaginations run wild here...

rows.label: campfev11_1400_msg0003
rows.name:
it would be quicker to go to
the Royal Ship's strategy room
and have them tell us.

rows.label: campfev11_1400_msg0004
rows.name:
Yeah, I know, but...
Kasumi, what do you think?

rows.label: campfev11_1400_msg0007
rows.name:
Maybe that the Nopon and the Tirkin
have started a war in Superbia?

rows.label: campfev11_1400_msg0008
rows.name: Now that would be a big deal.

rows.label: campfev11_1400_msg0009
rows.name:
There'd probably be feathers
everywhere after a war like that.

rows.label: campfev11_1400_msg0010
rows.name:
We could use them to make
blankets and make a fortune!

rows.label: campfev11_1400_msg0012
rows.name: You guys aren't taking this seriously at all...
